text:
Hey! 
North (the company my wife works for) is looking for a HOOD TO COAST partner to team up with this year.  It helps split up the planning responsibility and resources. They’d love to team up.

HOOD TO COAST
August 26 - 27, 2016 

What the partnership would entail (splitting the responsibilities, the below would be Uncorked's commitment.)

Approx 6 runners (+ alts to have as back ups just in case)
Van rental + Driver
Entry fee of $835 (total fee is $1670.)
1 - 2 volunteers

They’re looking for interest. Justin is out. But even if you’re not a runner, you can help by being  a volunteer.
I’ve run it before with my wife’s company and had a blast
If we can get 4 runners and a volunteer within Uncorked I’m sure we can find a few folks who would join our group. (Jonathan our landlord joined North’s team last year)
